result.execSummary:
The defendant Jeffrey S. Knutson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jeffrey S. Knutson

records.addlTxt: Reminder Notice

Defendant is experiencing sudden severe health issues and is applying for SSI.  Court amends payment plan to $25 per month starting June 15, 2019 and due by the 15th day of each month until 15CM132 and 15CM433 are paid in full.  Address verified.  Advised that further extension requests would have to be in writing for Judge's approval.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant appears via VTC with Attorney Davis.  Court orders $100 Cash Bond with conditions.
Initial Appearance- October 19, 2015 @ 9:00 a.m.
Initial appearance at 10-19-2015 09:00 am

No consumption or possession of alcohol.  No entering taverns, bars or liquor stores for any purpose.
DEFENDANT MUST COMPLY WITH THE BOND MONITORING PROGRAM.  
DEFENDANT MAY ONLY BE RELEASED ON WEEKDAYS (EXCLUDING HOLIDAYS) FROM 8:00 A.M. UNTIL 4:00 P.M.  DEFENDANT MUST GO IMMEDIATELY TO THE JUSTICE PROGRAMS OFFICE UPON SIGNING OF BOND AND/OR RELEASE.  THE BOND MONITORING PROGRAM IS LOCATED AT 919 HOESCHLER DRIVE, SUITE 100, SPARTA, WI.
CURFEW FROM 7:00 P.M. UNTIL 7:00 A.M. EXCEPT FOR WORK, TREATMENT OR TESTING PURPOSES ONLY IF APPROVED BY BOND MONITORING AHEAD OF TIME.
